title: Intelligent Life Magazine fonts
content:
Does anyone know the fonts used in Intelligent Life Magazine. I really like this italic.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131226024859im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Type_4303.jpg)
author: tonymcguigan

comments.content: looks like a modified version of garamond italic, the version that Apple used to use in their ads
I think Florian wanted to say, it’s DTL Fleischmann.
Err, yes. Sorry for being so cryptic; thanks Jan!
Thank you that DTL site is a great find expensive though!

Could somebody tell me the name of this font (also from Intelligent Life Magazine), Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131226024859im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img092_3989.jpg)
